welcome_message_body:
Welcome to Greece! Get ready to be enchanted by the stunning ancient ruins, beautiful beaches, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and soak up the charm of this historic and picturesque country.

Welcome to the United States! From the bustling city life to the natural wonders, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Take in the diverse culture, iconic landmarks, and friendly locals as you explore all that this country has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Rochester International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Greater Rochester International Airport serves domestic flights operated by Delta, American Airlines, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Greater Rochester International Airport serves domestic flights operated by JetBlue, Southwest, and Allegiant.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
